name: DEMAILCROMANCY: A Political Horror Game
description:
Election night. The streets are haunted. Police brutality extends BEYOND murder. Better deliver those ballots before it's too late...

Features
  • Fight ghosts!
  • Evade cops!
  • Drive a mail truck!
  • VOTE!
  • Experience a bizarre narrative! 
  • Make Gram Gram proud!
Controls

WASD/Arrows - Move

Spacebar - Attack / Interact

C - Toggle cruise control
